A "Do or Drink" game is a party game that involves players choosing between performing a dare (the "Do" option) or taking a drink of an alcoholic beverage (the "Drink" option). The game is typically played with a group of friends, and it can be a fun and entertaining way to spend an evening.\n\nTo play the "Do or Drink" game, follow these steps:
1. Gather a group of friends who are interested in playing the game.
2. Decide whether you want to play a sample deck or your own deck

3. If you want to play your own deck, you need to first create a set of dares or challenges. These dares or challenges can be as silly or as challenging as you like, and can include things like singing a song, doing a shot of a particular drink, or doing a series of push-ups.
4. Before playing the game, you will need to list down the names of each players. Note: do not shorten your name, use your first name in full such as Eric, Brandon, etc.
5. If a player chooses to perform the dare, they must complete it to the best of their ability. If they fail to complete the dare, they must take a drink as a penalty.
6. If a player chooses to take a drink instead of performing the dare, they must finish the drink before the next round starts.
7. The game continues until all the dares or challenges have been completed.
8. The player who completes the most dares or challenges without taking a drink is declared the winner.

It\'s important to remember to always drink responsibly and never pressure anyone to drink or do something they are not comfortable with. The "Do or Drink" game is meant to be a fun and lighthearted way to spend time with friends, so make sure to keep it that way.
